posts.post_content:
A noted set "toughie" as one of the "killer B's" group, the Benz is a difficult card to find with any back, much less the Broadleaf back.  This example is in really nice lowgrade, yet displayable condition.  $125 Delivered.

Thanks!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
